#Functions in a package
```{r}
a<- factor(c("Utkarsha","Sajitha","Swathi"))
b<-factor(c("pilani","hyd","goa","dubai"))
c(a,b)
factor(c(as.character(a),as.character(b)))
fbind<-function(a,b)
{
  factor(c(as.character(a),as.character(b)))
}
```
